title: Did the Minister of Defence of Trump "demilitarize" the National Guard in the capital before the rebellion?
subtitle: The prosecution stems from a memorandum dated 4 January from the former Defence Security Agency, Christopher Miller.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On January 4, 2021, two days before the riots by the supporters of the United States Capitol Trump, former Secretary of Defense Christopher Miller issued a note that the National Guard was "demilitarized" in the capital.
